CONSTRUCTION OF ARBOLITE IN KRASNODAR

Professional construction of houses from quality arbolite in Krasnodar, Krasnodar region and Crimea

Privacy Policy
"Arbolite Sth. Build" is a construction company with work experience since 2006. You can order the construction of a house from arbolite on a turnkey basis or partially in Krasnodar, Krasnodar region and Crimea. We provide a guarantee, we work strictly according to contract and with stage-by-stage payment. We build houses exclusively from high-quality arbolite blocks with structural strength and with excellent geometry. On request we show already built houses from arbolite.

Arbolite house designs

Catalog of ready-made projects of one-storey and two-storey houses from arbolite from our partners - design company SPlans

Main arbolite projects

House project #1

  • Total area 1964.306ft²
  • Living area 1155.721ft²
  • The dimensions of the house are 41.20 x 42.51 ft
  • Number of rooms 7
  • Number of bedrooms 5
  • There's an attic
  • Facade plaster finish
  • Wall material foam block / aerated concrete

Project of individual one-story dwelling house with attic with building dimensions 41.20 x 42.51 ft. Exterior finishing of the building - facade plaster of 2 colors. The foundation is a monolithic reinforced concrete strip. Exterior walls - gas concrete blocks with finishing with warm facade plaster. Internal walls and partitions - aerated concrete blocks. Floor of the 1st floor - ground floor. Interstorey floor - on wooden beams with the use of thermal insulation materials. using thermal insulation materials in the inter-beam space. The roof is multi-pitched. Roofing - asphalt shingles. Windows - metal-plastic.

Main arbolite projects

House project #2

  • Total area 1934.38ft²
  • Living area 1032.25ft²
  • The dimensions of the house are 42.02 x 49.54 ft
  • Number of rooms 5
  • There's a garage
  • There's an attic
  • Finishing plaster, der/panels
  • Wall material foam block / aerated concrete

Design of an individual one-story single-family dwelling with attic with building dimensions of 4.2 x 4.9 ft. Exterior finishing of the building - facade plaster and wooden panels. Foundation - bored pile foundation (pile-rocker). External walls - gas silicate blocks, insulation - extruded polystyrene foam with finishing facade plaster and wooden panels Internal walls - gas silicate blocks Partitions are made of gas silicate blocks. Ventilation ducts and chimneys are plastered on the outside. Lintels - monolithic and welded from rolled profile. Ceiling over the first floor - wooden beams. The floor of the first floor is a ground floor. The roof is multi-pitched. Roofing material - flexible roofing. Windows - metal-plastic, made to individual order.

Advantages of houses made of arbolite

The main advantages of residential houses made of arbolite blocks, built by the company "Arbolite Sth. Build"

Strong and warm walls
The walls of the house made of high-quality arbolite blocks can withstand the load of three floors, including the use of reinforced concrete floor slabs. And the thickness of the walls of arbolite in 11 inches is comfortable for living and does not require additional insulation.
Lightweight foundation
Arbolite unlike other building blocks is characterized by light weight, which allows you to significantly save on the foundation. The difference with brick, for example, is almost three times: 600-700 kg vs. two tons for one cube!
Good soundproofing
Walls made of arbolite blocks have excellent sound insulation values. The sound absorption coefficient of arbolite is 0.17-0.6 at sound frequencies of 125-2000 Hz against brick with data of 0.04 at 1000 Hz.
Ecological material
Arbolite consists of almost 90% natural wood - softwood chips. The remaining components are cement, water and aluminum sulfate. Aluminum sulfate is a known safe food additive E520.
Do not rot or burn
In a house made of arbolite, if the vapor permeability of the wall is correctly calculated, there will be no mold and fungi, all excess moisture goes out through the walls. As for combustibility - arboblocks do not burn, but support combustion, which is important.
No wall shrinkage
The walls of a house made of high-quality arbolite blocks have a minimum shrinkage of 0.4%. For comparison, the shrinkage coefficient of other building materials, such as aerated blocks and foam blocks, is 2 times greater.

Photos of the use of arbolite wall blocks in the process of building a residential house: cutting blocks with a saw and laying walls

Comparison of arbolite blocks

Comparative table with characteristics of arbolite and other wall blocks used for construction of residential houses

Types of blocks Arbolite Wood Gas silicate Foam block
Теплопроводность, Вт/(м℃) 0,09-0,17 0,1-0,38 0,12-0,2 0,14-0,38
Sound absorption, dB 0,019 0,1 0,2 0,2
Density, kg/m³ 400-700 400-600 300-700 300-700
Shrinkage, mm 0,4-0,5 300-100 0,5 1-3
Combustibility unsupported ignites non-flammable non-flammable

Arbolite production technology

Component composition and description of technology of manufacturing of arbolite blocks, which we use for construction

Preparation of raw materials

Four components are used to produce arbolite blocks: wood chips, M500 cement, aluminum sulfate and water.

Vibrocompression

Blocks are produced on specialized factory equipment in accordance with State Standard requirements.

Exposure in molds

After pressing, the blocks are kept in sealed molds for 24 hours, then disassembled and sent to the warehouse.

Shipment of blocks

Dried arbolite blocks are stacked on pallets, wrapped with strepping tape and shipped to customers.

Assortment of arbolite blocks

Line of construction arbolite blocks for the construction of external bearing walls, internal partitions and reinforcing belt

Porous block

Arbolite block with porous outer and/or inner layer for building a 1-3 storey high house. It does not blow and does not require finishing in the form of plaster. It can be used as a ready-made element of external walls.

Partition block

Arbolite block for the construction of internal partition walls with a width of 140 mm. It has excellent sound insulation in the room and also holds fasteners and curtain walling well.

Armoblock with recess

Arbolite block with a special U-shaped notch for the construction of a reinforcing belt between floors to distribute a uniform load on the load-bearing walls of the house and on the foundation. It is produced in the size of 500×300×250 mm.
